extensionDescription.message: Transform Spotify Web interface to light mode with a toggle switch.

themeHighContrastLabel.description: Label for high contrast theme option

statusThemeLight.description: Status message when light theme is active

statusThemeDark.description: Status message when dark theme is active

statusThemeSepia.description: Status message when sepia theme is active

statusThemeHighContrast.description: Status message when high contrast theme is active

statusThemeVintage.description: Status message when vintage theme is active

statusError.description: Status message when there's an error

statusNoTabs.description: Status message when no Spotify tabs are found

useSystemThemeLabel.description: Label for the system theme toggle
